Properties view

Properties view contents is different for each select element of the component hierarchy. But they all have three sections:

  • Results: Performances results information
  • Status: Various severity messages
  • Survey: Comment added while surveying

Note that the status may have multiple warning messages. So, this property is in fact a combo-box, to display all the messages, click on the drop-down button:

It's also possible to add a text into the survey comment on each properties:

This allow to remember what was the conclusion of the last survey concerning an element of the tree...
